p: Leaves (0.05 g) were ground with liquid nitrogen in a 10 mL centrifugal tube and extracted in 4 mL of 80% acetone at 4 Â°C in the dark overnight. With 80% acetone as the blank control, the absorbance of supernatant was measured by a UV-Vis 2450 spectrophotometer (Shimadzu, Kyoto, Japan) at wavelengths of 663 nm and 645 nm. According to Wellburn [ 36], chlorophyll and carotenoid contents were calculated.
